pullRequest.title: Fix for coerceVariableValues
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fix for coerceVariableValues to ensure that:

use null when variable defined in variableValuesMap is null;
if variableType is a Non‐Nullable type and value is null, throw a query error.

Linkage to algorithm defined in spec

nodes.bodyText: use null when variable defined in variableValuesMap is null
